SummaryEnglish: The coming-of-age school comedy anime is about the Kawagoe School Boys Choir Club and their instructor, a former orchestra conductor named Haruo Hibiki. The club members' personalities clash, but Haruo helps them grow together through singing, as they aim for the nationals of the Boys Choir contest.

1.SummaryEnglish: Tenshi, Ei-chan, and Shiratori all attend Kawagoe Academy. One day, they get pulled into the orbit of former conductor Haruo. He drags them into his newly founded boys choir where they suddenly find themselves performing a song in front of an audience!

2.SummaryEnglish: The boys choir doesn't have enough members to compete in the Kanto choir competition. Luckily, the principal has found two likely, if quirky, candidates. But it might not be so easy to get them to join the choir.

3.SummaryEnglish: Cardbocchi can't shake the feeling he's being watched. One day, on his way home, he feels like he's being followed, so he runs...straight into a group of delinquents! Meanwhile, Haruo is looking for new choir members. Again.

4.SummaryEnglish: The Hyuuga twins won't stop arguing with each other, even when it disrupts their classes. It's gotten so bad that they're at risk of having to repeat their first year of high school. Fortunately, the principal has a solution—join the boys choir!

5.SummaryEnglish: The principal has found an interesting video on NewTube. She has Rika and Haruo listen to it. Haruo decides that since the singers are more "yes" than "no," he needs to find them and add them to the choir. But the choir will have to catch them first!

6.SummaryEnglish: Now that the choir has ten members, it's time to get serious about entering the Kanto boys choir competition! The boys find out that last year's national winners are performing at a festival, so they go to check them out. Then they run into Maiden's dad!

7.SummaryEnglish: The choir heads into the mountains for a singing training camp, but when they arrive, they discover that the site they'd reserved is already being used by a rival school! Meanwhile, Haruo refuses to do anything but...look for kabocha squash?

8.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the choir to start rehearsing in earnest, but the AC is broken and it's too hot to think. They move to somewhere cooler, and Rika gives them a song to hone their rhythm. Then, they're swept up in a series of inexplicable events!

9.SummaryEnglish: IT hasn't been to school for a whole week. The whole choir is worried. Haruo spots IT in the street and drags him to choir practice, but he doesn't seem himself. Rika and Haruo visit his home to check on him and are shocked by what they find!

10.SummaryEnglish: The choir is still reeling from the loss of one of their members, but they're determined to practice as hard as they can for the upcoming competition. Unfortunately, their parents aren't happy about the choir's late hours and they complain to the school!

11.SummaryEnglish: It's finally time for the Kanto competition. Day one is the set piece performances and all of the choir's rivals are there. Will everything go exactly the way they've rehearsed, or should they expect the unexpected?

12.SummaryEnglish: Cardbocchi has vanished. The rest of the choir tries to find him so they can help with whatever he's going through. Tomorrow is the final day of the competition and the choir's last chance to show what they can do. Will they make it there together?
